WorkItem.Description:
Some non-USA Excel versions are using different character than comma as an argument separator in formulas. In the developer documentation, there is description how to „4.4.4. Write formula into a cell“ including the example.
 
I am proposing to add an example of writing formula which takes more than one argument to give people clear example, what is the argument separator.
 
An example of addition:
Please note that characters used as decimal, argument or matrix row separators must be written as in English localization, which can differ to your locale.
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValue('C5', '=IF(C4>500,"big amount","small amount")');
 
I know that this could be considered as silly issue (mainly because this information is written in the paragraph above), but I think that it is everytime better to give users more ways to accept information. Code example is one of them.
WorkItem.Summary: Put the example of formula with more arguments in documentation.
